ORIGAM Documentation : Less Than (<)

Created by Tomáš Vavrda, last modified on Sep 08, 2014

This function compares whether the value of the left expression is less than the value of the right expression The result is boolean.

Function Parameters

Left

Expression to compare

Possible children:

  • Data Constant
  • Field reference
  • Function

Right

Expression to compare

Possible children:

  • Data Constant
  • Field reference
  • Function
